title: Proxy Strain
description: A strain is a combination of code and content that enables the creation of a digital experience. Strains can be used to create language variants of websites, A/B tests, personalization, or to aggregate content from multiple sources

sticky.description: Sticky strains are not re-evaluated on every request. As soon as a visitor is determined to match a sticky strain, a session cookie will be set to keep the user in the strain.

url.description: URL condition (note, this will be merged into a more general condition language)

urls.description: URL condition (note, this will be merged into a more general condition language)

condition.description: VLC condition that controls that can optionally activate this strain.
